Query1.Label: List Past/Present Employees
Query1.Query: SELECT DISTINCT emp_id AS 'EmployeeID', first_name AS 'First Name', last_name AS 'Last Name' FROM employees LIMIT 100;

Query2.Label: List Job Titles
Query2.Query: SELECT DISTINCT title AS 'Job Title' FROM titles;

Query3.Label: List Current Employees
Query3.Query: SELECT DISTINCT first_name AS 'First Name', last_name AS 'Last Name' FROM employees INNER JOIN salaries USING (emp_id) where salaries.to_date = '9999-01-01' LIMIT 100;

Query4.Label: Count Any Employee Whose Surame Starts with a 'B'
Query4.Query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT first_name) AS 'Total with B' FROM employees WHERE first_name LIKE 'B%' LIMIT 100;

Query5.Label: List Any Employee Born After 1954
Query5.Query: SELECT DISTINCT first_name AS 'First Name',  last_name AS 'Last Name', birth_date AS 'Date of Birth' from employees where birth_date > '1954-01-01' LIMIT 100;

Query1.Label: List Department Titles
Query1.Query: SELECT DISTINCT dept_name AS 'Department Title' FROM departments LIMIT 100;

Query2.Label: List Number of Past/Present Employees
Query2.Query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT emp_id) AS 'N Employees' FROM employees;

Query3.Label: List Female Past/Present Employees
Query3.Query: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE gender = 'F' GROUP BY emp_ID LIMIT 100;

Query4.Label: List Past/Present Simmels Hired Before 01/01/1986
Query4.Query: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '1986-01-01' AND last_name = 'Simmel' GROUP BY emp_ID LIMIT 100;

Query5.Label: List Current Job Title per Employee
Query5.Query: SELECT DISTINCT titles.emp_id AS 'EmployeeID', first_name AS 'First Name', last_name AS 'Last Name', title AS 'Job Title', from_date AS 'Start Date' FROM titles INNER JOIN employees USING(emp_id) WHERE to_date = '9999-01-01' LIMIT 100;

Query1.Label: Count Employees Working Since May-1991
Query1.Query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT employees.emp_id) AS 'Employee Count' FROM employees INNER JOIN salaries USING(emp_id) WHERE hire_date >= '1991-05-01' AND to_date = '9999-01-01';

Query2.Label: List Count of Postitions Held by Any Employee
Query2.Query: SELECT emp_id, COUNT(DISTINCT title) AS 'N_Titles' FROM titles GROUP BY emp_id HAVING N_Titles >= 2 ORDER BY N_Titles LIMIT 100;

Query3.Label: Count Active Salaries Between 90,000 - 90,004
Query3.Query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT emp_id) AS 'Employee Count' FROM salaries WHERE to_date = '9999-01-01' AND (salary BETWEEN 90000 AND 90004);

Query4.Label: Get Salary History for Employee '10012'
Query4.Query: SELECT salaries.emp_id, employees.first_name, employees.last_name, salary, from_date, to_date FROM salaries INNER JOIN employees USING(emp_id) WHERE salaries.emp_id = 10012;

Query5.Label: Count Active Managers
Query5.Query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT emp_id) AS 'N Managers' FROM dept_manager WHERE to_date = '9999-01-01';
